titleStmt.title: Astrologie proved to be the old doctrine of demons, professed by the worshippers of Saturne, Jupiter, Mars, sunne and moon in which is proved that the planetary and fixed starres are the powers of the ayre, which by Gods permission are directed by Satan ... / written by an unworthy witnesse of the truth of God, John Brayne.
titleStmt.author: Brayne, John.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by M.S. for John Hancock ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in British Library.
